backend/main.mo: Defines core POS backend types and state maps for products, stock, transactions, promotions, and authorization with initial structures but truncated before save operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking checkout and transaction-calculation fixes to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths mapped to short functional descriptions covering utilities, features, offline storage, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style layer configuring OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes with shared component styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining TOKO FADLI branding, icons, theme colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Simple service worker caching static assets with install, fetch, and activate handlers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router setup defining all application routes with theme provider, auth gate, and layout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Global application layout with navigation, user menu, theming, and role-based admin links using Indonesian translations.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Shows an alert when the browser is offline, updating state via online/offline events.
frontend/src/features/admin/sampleData.t: Loads predefined categories, products, and payment methods into local storage and queues them for sync.
frontend/src/features/admin/SampleDataLo: Card UI that triggers loading sample data with confirmation and loading states.
frontend/src/features/admin/UsersPage.ts: User management page showing role info and including the sample data loader card.
frontend/src/features/auth/AdminReauthDi: Dialog prompting admins to reauthenticate via Internet Identity before sensitive actions.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Protects routes by handling login, profile setup, and loading states for authenticated users.
frontend/src/features/auth/IdleLock.tsx: Locks the session after inactivity and requires reauthentication to unlock.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupD: Dialog for creating a user profile with name and role, saving via actor API.
frontend/src/features/auth/useCurrentUse: Hook fetching the current user profile and role from the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/barcode/barcodeRes: Finds a matching product variant by barcode from a product list.
frontend/src/features/barcode/CameraBarc: Camera-based barcode scanner with error handling and manual input fallback.
frontend/src/features/barcode/HidBarcode: Hook that listens for fast keyboard input to detect HID barcode scans.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalogFor: Defines product form structure and validates required fields and pricing rules.
frontend/src/features/catalog/CatalogPag: Product and category management UI allowing creation, editing, and syncing of catalog data with offline storage.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalogSto: Exports functions to derive product keys and apply upsert updates to product lists.
frontend/src/features/catalog/ProductCsv: Allows exporting products to CSV and importing product data from CSV with error handling.
frontend/src/features/checkout/CheckoutP: Checkout interface handling cart totals, multiple payments, validation, and transaction creation.
frontend/src/features/checkout/paymentVa: Validates payment entries ensuring amounts are valid and cover the total due.
frontend/src/features/inventory/Inventor: Displays stock levels, highlights low-stock items, and allows stock adjustments with sync support.
frontend/src/features/inventory/inventor: Zustand store for managing lowâ€‘stock threshold settings.
frontend/src/features/inventory/Receivin: Handles receiving stock from suppliers, updating product stock and cost, and syncing entries.
frontend/src/features/payments/PaymentMe: Manages payment methods with create, toggle-enabled, and offline sync support using dialogs and tables.
frontend/src/features/pos/cartStore.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand store for cart items, discounts, tax, and computed totals with mutation helpers.
frontend/src/features/pos/PosPage.tsx: Implements the POS interface with product search, barcode scanning, cart management, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/features/pos/priceTier.ts: Provides helpers to select a price tier based on quantity and return retail or wholesale prices.
frontend/src/features/pos/productSelecto: Exposes hooks for filtering active products and performing text or SKU/barcode search.
frontend/src/features/promotions/promoEn: Contains logic to check promotion eligibility and compute discount amounts.
frontend/src/features/promotions/Promoti: UI for creating and listing promotions with offline storage and sync integration.
frontend/src/features/pwa/PwaInstallGuid: Displays PWA installation instructions and triggers install prompts with localized content.
frontend/src/features/receipts/PrintRece: Dialog for previewing and printing receipts with selectable paper width using ReceiptTemplate.
frontend/src/features/receipts/ReceiptTe: Renders a printable receipt layout showing transaction details, items, totals, and payments with responsive widths.
frontend/src/features/reports/reportCalc: Provides helper functions to compute daily revenue summaries and aggregate product sales from transactions.
frontend/src/features/reports/ReportsPag: Displays reporting UI with date filtering, revenue summaries, product sales data, and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/features/returns/ReturnFlow: Implements a basic return lookup UI with transaction ID search placeholder and return policy display.
frontend/src/features/sync/SyncStatusPag: Shows offline sync queue status, pending/failed counts, last sync time, and triggers manual synchronization.
frontend/src/features/transactions/Trans: Loads and displays transaction details, items, payments, and offers receipt printing and navigation controls.
frontend/src/features/transactions/trans: Contains functions to compute net sales based on refund/void status and update inventory after refunds.
frontend/src/features/void/VoidTransacti: Provides a dialog to void a transaction with reason input and admin reauthentication before confirming.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers. Includes AuthClient setup and restores identity on mount.
frontend/src/i18n/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency, dates, times, and numbers using Indonesian locale settings.
frontend/src/i18n/strings.id.ts: Indonesian translation dictionary containing UI strings for auth, navigation, POS, catalog, CSV, and other app sections.
frontend/src/i18n/t.ts: Simple translation helpers that resolve nested keys from the Indonesian strings dictionary, with fallback and array support.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode, and custom glass-effect utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/offline/masterDataCache.ts: React Query hook that loads cached master data from IndexedDB and keeps it fresh for five minutes.
frontend/src/offline/storage.ts: IndexedDB storage layer for master data, transactions, and sync queue, including CRUD helpers and automatic queueing of new transactions.
frontend/src/offline/syncQueue.ts: Manages reading and processing sync queue items from IndexedDB, updating statuses and retry attempts with placeholder sync logic.
frontend/src/pwa/useInstallPrompt.ts: Hook that manages PWA installation prompts, tracking install eligibility, installation state, and providing an install trigger.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Exports arbitrary data arrays to semicolon-delimited CSV and triggers a browser download with proper value escaping.
frontend/src/utils/csvParse.ts: Provides semicolon-delimited CSV export for products and a custom CSV importer that validates headers, parses quoted fields, constructs product objects, and records import errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters (including hash mode), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, radius, shadows, keyframes, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing PWA POS goals, architecture decisions, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
